item.title: CVE-2022-27851|2024-08-03T05:41:10.197Z -- dnesscarkey -- use%20any%20font%20%7C%20custom%20font%20uploader%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) in Use Any Font (WordPress plugin) <= 6.1.7 allows an attacker to deactivate the API key.
